name: spend-smart
author: Shourya Saxena
description: Expense-Tracker is a user-friendly platform designed to streamline your financial management effortlessly. With Expense-Tracker, you can easily track expenses, manage income, and stay on top of your finances effortlessly. Easily add transactions,and navigate your dashboard with ease. Take control of your finances with Expense-Tracker.

scripts.setup: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev"  "cd frontend && npm run dev"
